multiplechoiceresponse.label: I downloaded the python_lib.zip file, unzipped it, and put all the files into Files & Uploads, and I set up a matching problem with from python_lib import HXGraders. Now my problem doesn't work! What did I do wrong?

choicegroup.choice: It could be a lot of things. Ok, fair point, but stick to the context of this section.
I unzipped it. Keep the file zipped.
I put it in Files & Uploads. It needs to be in an external repo.
I imported python_lib. It should be python_lib.zip.
